articles.title: Olympic champion pleads guilty to felony - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: Klete Keller, a two-time Olympic gold medallist with the US swim team, pleaded guilty on Wednesday to participating in the January 6 attack on Congress by supporters of former president Donald Trump.
articles.content: A two-time Olympic gold medallist has pleaded guilty to participating in an attack by supporters of former president Donald Trump.Klete Keller, a two-time Olympic gold medallist with the US swim team… [+2508 chars]
